```{r setup}
library(MATH4753p1)
```

In summary, this package was created as a place to hold functions used for statistical analysis through R-Studio, as used in labs for MATH4753. These functions have a variety of uses: 

* T-tests
* Pivotal Statistics and evaluation through calculation and graphs 
* Data set to be evaluated and analyzed
* Confidence Interval Calculations
* Experimental Simulations
* And more.
